TopicPolicy.Name: AWS::SNS::TopicPolicy
TopicPolicy.Description:
A policy document that contains permissions to add to the specified SNS
            topics.The Amazon Resource Names (ARN) of the topics to which you want to add the policy.
            You can use the Ref function to
            specify an AWS::SNS::Topic
            resource.

Topic.Name: AWS::SNS::Topic
Topic.Description:
A developer-defined string that can be used to identify this SNS topic.The SNS subscriptions (endpoints) for this topic.A name for the topic. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique
                  physical ID and uses that ID for the topic name. For more information, see Name Type.ImportantIf you specify a name, you cannot do updates that require this resource to be replaced.
You can still do updates that require no or some interruption. If you must replace the resource, specify a new name.Returns the name for an Amazon SNS topic.

Subscription.Name: AWS::SNS::Subscription
Subscription.Description:
The endpoint that receives notifications from the Amazon SNS topic. The endpoint
                  value depends on the protocol that you specify. For more information, see the
                     Subscribe Endpoint
                  parameter in the Amazon Simple Notification Service API Reference.The subscription's protocol. For more information, see the Subscribe Protocol parameter in
                  the Amazon Simple Notification Service API Reference.The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the topic to subscribe to.
